title: Unchained Melody
lyrics: Oh, m m y love, my darling, I've hungered for y y our touch A long, lonel lonel y time And time g g oes by so slowly and time can do so much Are you still miiiiiiiiiiiine I need your love, I nee-- nee-- eed your love God speed your love tooooo-ooooo me Lonely rivers flow to the sea, to the sea To the open arms of the sea Lonely rivers sigh, wait for me, wait for me I'll be coming home, wait for me Oh, my love, my darling, I've hungered, hungered for your love For love. Lonely time. And time goes by, so slowly, and time can do so much, Are you still mine? I need your love, I, I need your love. God speed your love to me
